comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Here we go! Abercrombie Place is now Abercrombie Street in CHIPPENDALE Bank Street is now Meagher Street Bartley Street is now Bartley Street (!) GoogleMapsStreetView It looks as if 94-98 Abercrombie Street have been rebuilt (see the cut-off pediment on no.100) cutting off the corner (clearly seen on GoogleMapsSatellite). I bet this was to accommodate a TRAMWAY - hence the NSW Government interest and this photo. Tramway expert needed to work out which tramway and when!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This 1907 (?) tram map shows a branch line from Central to a loop in Erskineville just as predicted - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview/?pi=nla.map-db66-sd&rgn=0....
